forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, today unfolds with the kind of clarity that invites exploration. The sun casts a mellow light across the cityscape, and while the temperatures hover around a cool, comfortable 64 degrees, the afternoon brings a slight dip, settling closer to 62. The brisk west winds dance through the streets, urging you to tuck in your collar or don a light jacket—especially as the steel blue of the sky mingles with the cotton-soft clouds that seem to gently hang over the Golden Gate. 

As evening approaches, the atmosphere shifts to a welcoming embrace of partly cloudy skies, ushering in a refreshing breeze. With the low expected near 56, it’s a perfect time to stroll through nearby parks or sip something warm at your favorite café. Today’s weather whispers of possibility, urging residents and visitors alike to savor the pleasures of the moment—perhaps an evening walk along the Embarcadero or indulging in a quiet moment with a book in a sun-kissed corner. The fog remains at bay for now, so the views are exposed, allowing the iconic architecture to shine in all its glory.
